ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Understanding hypermedia as the engine of application state
ygData.msgSnippet: Perhaps this simple example will highlight the difference in emphasis between HATEOAS and mere connectedness . Let s take a hypothetical wiki. Like any wiki,
